Package gui

Class ArchitectureFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.ArchitectureFunctions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ArchitectureFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class that is responsible for all architecture-related methods triggered by the GUI.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Right now, only one case study.

                    Term.Operator op,
                    java.lang.String funcName,
                    java.lang.String t1,
                    java.lang.String t2,
                    java.lang.String t3)
        Method that adds a term to the architecture's Set.
        Parameters:
        opType - the operator type
        op - the explicit operator
        funcName - the name of the function
        t1 - the name of the first term
        t2 - the name of the second term
        t3 - the name of the third term

        type - the type of the equation
        e1 - the name of the first equation
        e2 - the name of the second equation

        t2 - the name of the second term

        c2 - the name of the trusted component

                   java.lang.String var)

        Parameters:
        comp - the name of the component
        var - the name of the obtained variable

                       java.lang.String eq)

        Parameters:

        eq - the name of the obtained equation

      • addReceive

        public void addReceive​(java.lang.String comp1,
                       java.lang.String comp2,
                       java.util.Set<java.lang.String> stateSet,
                       java.util.Set<java.lang.String> varSet)
        Method that adds a 'receive' event to the architecture's Set.
        Parameters:
        comp1 - the name of the receiving component
        comp2 - the name of the sending component
        stateSet - a Set of the names of the statements to send
        varSet - a Set of the names of the variables to send

      • addCheck

        public void addCheck​(java.lang.String comp,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> eqSet)
        Method that adds a 'check' event to the architecture's Set.
        Parameters:
        comp - the name of the component
        eqSet - a Set of the names of equations to check

      • delete

        public void delete​(java.lang.String comp,
                   java.lang.String var)
        Method that adds a 'delete' event to the architecture's Set.
        Parameters:
        comp - the deleting component
        var - the variable to delete

      • addVerify

        public void addVerify​(java.lang.String comp,
                      java.lang.String stmt,
                      boolean proof)
        Method that adds a 'verify' event to the architecture's Set.
        Parameters:
        comp - the acting component
        stmt - the statement to verify
        proof - flag to indicate proof or attestation

      • addDep

        public void addDep​(java.lang.String comp,
                   java.lang.String var,
                   java.util.Set<java.lang.String> varSet,
                   java.lang.String probability)
        Method that adds a dependence relation to the architecture's Set.
        Parameters:
        comp - the name of the component
        var - the name of the variable that can be deduced
        varSet - a Set of the name of variables that have to be known
        probability - the probability of the dependence relation

      • addDed

        public void addDed​(java.lang.String comp,
                   java.util.Set<java.lang.String> dedSet)
        Method that adds a deduction capability to the architecture's Set.
        Parameters:
        comp - the name of the component
        dedSet - a Set of the names of deductions

      • addDeduc

        public void addDeduc​(java.lang.String name,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> premises,
                     java.lang.String conclusion,
                     java.lang.String probability)
        Method that adds a deduction to the architecture's Set.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the deduction
        premises - a Set of the names of premise equations
        conclusion - the name of the conclusion equation
        probability - the probability of the dependence relation

      • addAttest

        public void addAttest​(java.lang.String comp,
                      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> eqs)
        Method that adds an attestation to the architecture's Set.
        Parameters:
        comp - the name of the attesting component
        eqs - a Set of the names of equations to be attested

      • addProof

        public void addProof​(java.lang.String comp,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ps)
        Method that adds a proof to the architecture's Set.
        Parameters:
        comp - the name of the component
        ps - a Set of the names of the attestations and equations

      • addPropHas

        public void addPropHas​(java.lang.String comp,
                       java.lang.String var,
                       java.lang.String probability)
        Method that adds a 'has' property to the architecture's Set.
        Parameters:
        comp - the name of the component
        var - the name of the variable that the component should have
        probability - the probability of the dependence relation

                         java.lang.String probability)

        Parameters:
        comp - the name of the component
        eq - the name of the equation to be known
        probability - the probability of the property

        var - the name of the variable that should not be shared
